title: Can someone help me i cant log in to the league website to ask for a help a roites
body: i have problem getting on my main account on the league web site im on my other account  and i want talk to someone for help for my main account but i cant log on plz help

replies.body:
What's happening when you try logging in? It can be a little hard to troubleshoot without knowing what's happening when it goes wrong, but my first step would be to try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to reset any saved data.

Otherwise, feel free to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and just let us know which account you're referencing.
I had this issue earlier. I simply logged out and logged back in and it worked.
